citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00am on
February 14, 2024. The inspector knocked on the door to the facility and called the number on file but no one was
present.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00am on 
February 14, 2024. The inspector knocked on the door to the facility and called the number on file but no one was 
present. 
 
 
End Section
